newsitem.title: POLAND: NBP DRAINS PLN 178 MLN FROM POLISH MONEY MARKET.
newsitem.headline: NBP DRAINS PLN 178 MLN FROM POLISH MONEY MARKET.

text.p: The National Bank of Poland drained 178 million zlotys from the market through a reverse NBP-bill repurchase auction after banks bid to place 178 million with the central bank, the NBP said.
The bank drained the market for 14 days at an unchanged maximum rate of 21.64 percent.
